parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name>game1</name>=<value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>version1</name>=<value> 2.02

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control

</value></part><part><name>descr</name>=<value> Sets URL property of the given control subject to <tt>allowedHTMLLoadURIs[]</tt> whitelisting in [[CfgCommands]] config. Supported controls are:
* <tt>CT_BUTTON</tt>
* <tt>CT_SHORTCUTBUTTON</tt> 
* <tt>CT_ACTIVETEXT</tt>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>important</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>URL should be written in lower case including address prefix. For example <tt><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>HTTP://ARMA3.COM/</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext></tt> will not pass allowed filter validation but <tt><ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>http://arma3.com/</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext></tt> will.</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>mp</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>pr</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>s1</name>=<value> control [[ctrlSetURL]] URL

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> URL: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name>r1</name>=<value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetURL]] "<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>http://arma3.com/</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>"; // note the forward slash / at the end</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ctrlURL]]
</value></part></template></root>
